title: Tsp_exchange
author: Tsp_exchange
created_time: July 18, 2023, 08:23:13 AMLast edit: September 04, 2023, 08:31:30 AM by Tsp_exchange
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community Friends ,We are excited to announce that the perpetual test version of Tsp.exchange is about to go live! We aim to bring a new level of transparency and user experience to the crypto trading world, and we need your help to make it the best it can be.Tsp.exchange is not your typical DEX or CEX. We've taken the best of both worlds to create a new kind of exchange - a Transparent Exchange(TEX). We've addressed the high entry barriers and poor user experience often associated with decentralized exchanges, while also solving the opacity and backroom dealings that plague many centralized exchanges.Our platform offers the transparency and security of a DEX, combined with the user-friendly experience of a CEX. This is a game-changer in the crypto trading world, and we want you to be a part of it.We will be posting regular updates in this thread as we prepare for the launch of the test version. We invite you to join the discussion, provide feedback, and even participate in the testing phase. Your input can help shape the future of crypto trading.Stay tuned for more updates and let's revolutionize the crypto trading experience together!Best,Tsp.exchangeP.S. We encourage open discussion and constructive criticism. Let's make Tsp.exchange the best it can be, together!#TransparentExchange #TspExchange #CryptoTradingRevolution

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: Tsp_exchange on July 18, 2023, 08:23:13 AMOur platform offers the transparency and security of a DEX, combined with the user-friendly experience of a CEX. This is a game-changer in the crypto trading world, and we want you to be a part of it.50% CEX, 50% DEX. This could be the mixture that many people are seeking for.Considering the name of your project Transparent Exchange (TEX), is the code of your project open or closed?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Tsp_exchange on July 18, 2023, 08:23:13 AMWe will be posting regular updates in this thread as we prepare for the launch of the test version. We invite you to join the discussion, provide feedback, and even participate in the testing phase. Your input can help shape the future of crypto trading.How many threads do you plan to have about your tex innovation? It seems that you have not drawn the attention of the user in previous threads to what you have to offer. What is the difference now?You could continue the discussion in the same thread without any problems, like all the others.Quote from: Tsp_exchange on July 18, 2023, 08:23:13 AM#TransparentExchange #TspExchange #CryptoTradingRevolutionp.s. This forum does not work on the same principle as social networks, hashtags are useless.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I have read your previous thread, I know that Tsp.exchange is a mixture of centralized and decentralized platforms, as far as I understand you are trying to take the best of both genres and combine them into a new one.But it is not yet clear what features you will keep and which ones you will remove, although I do not yet understand why they are called transparent exchanges but it is good that the permanent beta version of Tsp.exchange is about to start as you mentioned.When the beta version is launched, we can experiment and judge.

comments.author: Tsp_exchange
comments.body: Quote from: KingsDen on July 18, 2023, 10:53:14 AMQuote from: Tsp_exchange on July 18, 2023, 08:23:13 AMOur platform offers the transparency and security of a DEX, combined with the user-friendly experience of a CEX. This is a game-changer in the crypto trading world, and we want you to be a part of it.50% CEX, 50% DEX. This could be the mixture that many people are seeking for.Considering the name of your project Transparent Exchange (TEX), is the code of your project open or closed?yep,the project code will be open.Currently, the project is still in internal testing, but we will soon invite some community members to participate in the testing phase,welcome your participation and suggestions.If you're interested, please follow us on Twitter and Discord where we will regularly update the latest news about the project.https://twitter.com/Tsp_exchange

comments.author: Tsp_exchange
comments.body: Update!https://gov.gmx.io/t/grant-request-gmx-tsp-exchange-proposal/2341GMX <> Tsp.exchange ProposalProposal DescriptionTsp.exchange which a novel decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator APP. Our core goal is to offer users a trading experience akin to that of centralized exchanges (CEX), while ensuring the transparency and security inherent to decentralized exchanges (DEX).To achieve this goal, weâ€™ve addressed two pivotal challenges of DEX:By adopting the 4337 protocol, weâ€™ve significantly simplified user private key management, thereby reducing the complexity of using a DEX.Our user interface is designed to closely resemble CEXs, ensuring users donâ€™t have to alter their trading habits.Despite GMXâ€™s advanced technology and philosophy, its end-user base remains limited. We believe this is primarily due to its user experience differing significantly from mainstream centralized exchanges like Binance and OKX. This is where Tsp.exchange comes into play, addressing this core issue for GMX. This collaboration is not only mutually beneficial but also synergistic, and we believe it will resonate with the community members.Weâ€™ve successfully integrated with GMX V1 and are currently in the beta testing phase. In the future, we plan to invite members of the GMX community to participate in this beta test. Simultaneously, weâ€™re also planning to integrate with GMX V2. However, due to financial constraints, this plan faces challenges. If GMX can provide financial support or consider investing in us, it would greatly expedite our development process.A successful grant application will not only bolster our product promotion and brand endorsement but will also drive more users and traffic to GMX.
